(31) Ni-kukuetshitshemû tshetshî mâ mûpishtuâkuenit ukâuîuâu Pûn mâk Mânî.
1-asked if visit-3PL mother Paul and Marie
`I asked about Paul and Marie if they visited their mother' or `I asked about their mother
if Paul and Marie visited her.'
